ErrorCode.name: Error
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Failed to handle an interface method invocation.
ErrorCode.description: During the execution of an ObservationControl or ObservationQuery interface method, the correlator software has detected an error condition which prevents successful completion. Contextual information about the exact error condition is added, at run time, as a string data field by the name Control::EX_USER_ERROR_MSG and, finally, the present error code is thrown as a CORBA exception.
